thread.title: Terror Attacks: Trump Continues to Point the Finger at Obama Administration | Election
thread.title_full: Terror Attacks: Trump Continues to Point the Finger at Obama Administration | Election

author: Thomas Byrne
title: Terror Attacks: Trump Continues to Point the Finger at Obama Administration | Election
text:
You Decide Sep 21, 2016 
With the first Presidential debate just days away, Democrat Hillary Clinton has been prepping at home, while Republican Donald Trump courts voters on the campaign trail. 
FOX’s Rachel Sutherland reports from Washington: 
At a rally in battleground North Carolina, Trump again blamed the Obama administration for recent terror attacks: 
(Trump) “These attacks were made possible because of our extremely open immigration system which fails to properly vet or screen individuals or families coming into our country.” 
A Real Clear Politics average of polls shows Trump and Clinton are tied in North Carolina, 43-43. 
Meanwhile, the Trump campaign is downplaying a “Washington Post” report that Republican used money from his charitable Trump Foundation to settle lawsuits involving his business interests. 
In Washington, Rachel Sutherland, FOX News. Follow Rachel Sutherland on Twitter: @SutherlandFOX Audio clip:
